message: Let's split it 4:1, you can't do better than this!
You're getting desperate, take it or leave it!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you less than I offered before!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control!
You're trying to squeeze me out, but I'll squeeze back!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
You're trying to starve me out, but I'll take the last crumbs!
Last chance, take it or walk away!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the last bit!
